name: mcp-server_search_restaurants
description:
Search for restaurants on Diningcode based on the provided query

Args:
    query: Search query for restaurants

Returns:
    List of restaurant information

name: mcp-server_get_restaurant_details
description:
Get detailed information about a specific restaurant

Args:
    restaurant_id: The ID of the restaurant on Diningcode

Returns:
    Dictionary containing restaurant details
